backend/DirectionType.mo: Defines a DirectionType variant with #up and #down options for market direction.
backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing market data management, user profiles, preferences, HTTP outcalls for crypto data, access control with admin/user roles, and snapshot caching with configurable refresh intervals.
backend/MarketData.mo: Defines MarketData type containing symbol, price, volume, and direction fields.
backend/Theme.mo: Defines Theme variant with #darkNeon and #cyberGlow options.
backend/UserPreferences.mo: Defines UserPreferences and UserPreferencesInput types for storing user settings including favorites, theme, alerts, and language.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting immutable frontend paths including authentication hooks, actor management, and UI components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, PWA configuration, and styling with details on market data, radar alerts, and mobile optimization.
frontend/index.css: Empty CSS file (content truncated or not present).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with comprehensive PWA meta tags, iOS splash screens, app icons, and standalone mode configuration for crypto market assistant app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, splash screens, shortcuts to key tabs (Mercado, Radar, Recomendações, Opportunities, Pesquisa), and standalone display mode.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker v9 implementing static asset caching, runtime caching, old cache cleanup, and offline fallback with critical icon verification.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that manages tab navigation, service worker registration, learning engine initialization, online/offline status, and renders the primary UI layout with Header, Footer, and various dashboard tabs (Market, Radar, Recommendations, etc.).
frontend/src/components/AIPerformancePan: Displays AI learning statistics for assets including learning level, accuracy rate, prediction count, and confidence metrics with visual progress bars and badges; supports both single-asset and top-10 overview modes.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary component that catches uncaught errors, displays a user-friendly error UI with reload functionality, and clears service worker caches to resolve PWA cache mismatch issues.
frontend/src/components/AssetResearch.ts: Asset research interface with search/autocomplete for Binance Futures symbols, displays selected asset details, and integrates PredictiveConfidencePanel for AI-driven analysis.
frontend/src/components/DataStatusIndica: Fixed-position status indicator that displays alerts when data is stale, fetching, or has errors (including Binance access blocks), showing last update time and provider information with retry functionality.
frontend/src/components/DynamicAlerts.ts: Manages and displays dynamic toast-style alerts for radar anomalies and high-confidence recommendations with sensitivity-aware cooldowns, auto-dismissal, and user preference controls.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice with a heart icon and a link to caffeine.ai, styled with responsive design and backdrop blur.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with app branding, logo, and conditional PWA install button that shows when the app is installable but not yet installed, with responsive mobile/desktop layouts.
frontend/src/components/ICPAnalysis.tsx: Detailed analysis component for ICP (Internet Computer) cryptocurrency displaying price, trends, manipulation zones, institutional orders, and predictive confidence with neon-styled UI effects.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Proactive PWA install prompt that appears after 3 seconds if the app is installable, showing a dismissible card with install instructions and opening a detailed dialog on user action.
frontend/src/components/InstitutionalOrd: Component displaying BTC institutional buy/sell signals for both Binance Futures (USD-M) and Spot markets with refresh functionality, error categorization, and formatted price/timestamp displays.
frontend/src/components/MarketCard.tsx: Reusable card component for displaying individual market data including symbol, price, 24h change percentage, volume, and strength with neon-styled bullish/bearish visual indicators and selection state.
frontend/src/components/MarketOverview.t: Main market overview component displaying a grid of market cards with live Binance Futures data, selection handling, predictive analysis panels, AI performance metrics, and scrollable layout with error states.
frontend/src/components/MarketSnapshotDi: Component file appears to be empty or truncated in the provided content.
frontend/src/components/Opportunities.ts: Main component displaying trading opportunities across multiple modalities (scalping, swing, breakout, reversal, SMC, FVG) with tabbed navigation, opportunity cards, and a detail panel for selected symbols.
frontend/src/components/OpportunityDetai: Side panel component showing detailed trade setup information for a selected symbol, including current price, trade recommendation with entry/exit/stop-loss levels, and risk/reward calculations.
frontend/src/components/OrderBook.tsx: Component displaying order book depth data for both futures and spot markets with configurable aggregation levels, refresh functionality, and formatted bid/ask tables with error handling.
frontend/src/components/PredictiveConfid: Renders a confidence meter for technical analysis predictions with color-coded gradients (green/cyan/purple) based on confidence levels. Supports both compact and full card layouts with animated progress bars and confidence badges.
frontend/src/components/PWADiagnosticsVi: Diagnostic view component showing PWA installation status, display mode, install prompt availability, and technical details about the app's standalone capabilities.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallDialog: Dialog component for PWA installation with platform-specific instructions (iOS Safari vs other browsers) and install prompt triggering functionality.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallStatus: Displays PWA installation status with badges and instructions for different platforms (Android/iOS), showing whether the app is installed, installable, or not supported. Provides install buttons and platform-specific guidance for adding the app to home screen.
frontend/src/components/RadarDashboard.t: Main dashboard for monitoring market anomalies and radar alerts with filtering by trend, confidence, and anomaly types (price moves, volume spikes, volatility, etc.). Manages alert state, learning data enrichment, and persists filter preferences to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/ResetFromScratch: Confirmation dialog for resetting all app data including AI learning history, user preferences, and caches. Handles the reset operation with loading states and reloads the app after successful reset.
frontend/src/components/TabFetchErrorSta: Error state component for tab data loading failures with reload functionality. Detects and provides special messaging for PWA cache-related interface mismatch errors.
frontend/src/components/TabPageCard.tsx: Reusable card wrapper component for tab pages with neon-styled header containing icon, title, description, and optional badge. Provides consistent layout and styling across tab content.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: React context provider for managing theme switching between 'darkNeon' and 'cyberGlow' themes. Applies theme CSS classes to document root and persists selection to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/TopRecommendatio: React component that displays top 10 trading recommendations with confidence scores, learning levels, and institutional order detection. Integrates market data, predictive confidence panels, and AI performance metrics with loading/error states.
User preferences component managing favorite assets, theme selection (Dark Neon/Cyber Glow), alert toggles, and AI learning prioritization. Includes PWA install status, diagnostics, and a reset-from-scratch dialog with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/analysisEnric: Calculates advanced technical analysis with SMC-based confidence scoring, manipulation zone detection, institutional order detection, and learning engine integration. Generates support/resistance zones, price predictions, and descriptive tags based on volume, volatility, and trade patterns.
Browser-based fetching functions for Binance Futures USD-M API, including all market data and specific asset queries. Handles error classification for network issues, CORS blocks, and restricted location responses.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/binanceFuture: Fetches Binance Futures funding rates and open interest data with safe partial-failure handling. Includes session-based in-memory metrics history for detecting changes over time.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/institutional: Detects institutional trading signals from BTC market data using volume patterns and price action analysis. Provides React Query hooks for both Futures and Spot markets with backend fallback support.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/learningInteg: Integrates with the learning engine to record predictions and update results based on market data. Supports prioritization of favorite symbols with adjusted confidence thresholds.
Generates trading recommendations and radar alerts by analyzing market anomalies including price moves, volume spikes, volatility, funding rates, and open interest. Uses adaptive baselines and sensitivity policies.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/opportunityRu: Implements rule-based opportunity selection for different trading strategies (scalping, swing) by scoring assets based on volume, volatility, momentum, and other technical criteria.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/orderBookDept: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and parse order book depth data from Binance Futures and Spot APIs with backend fallback. Includes error classification and metrics computation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/unifiedSnapsh: Transforms backend UnifiedSnapshot data into frontend-compatible BinanceMarketData format with technical analysis enrichment. Includes safe number conversion and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and delegation validation using @dfinity/auth-client.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpportunities.ts: Computes trading opportunities grouped by modality (scalping, swing, breakout, reversal, SMC, FVG) by applying selection rules to live Binance market data.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWADiagnostics.ts: Runs comprehensive PWA diagnostics including display mode detection, service worker status, manifest validation, and critical icon availability checks.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Manages PWA installation state and prompts, detecting installability, handling beforeinstallprompt events, and providing iOS-specific guidance.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Fetches and enriches Binance Futures market data with technical analysis, learning engine predictions, radar alerts, and recommendations while managing learning prioritization for favorite assets.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarSensitivity.t: Manages radar sensitivity preset (conservative/balanced/aggressive) with localStorage persistence and cross-tab synchronization.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerUpdat: Detects service worker updates and provides a function to activate waiting workers and reload the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useTradeRecommendatio: React hook that computes trade recommendations for a selected symbol and modality by finding the asset in market data and calling the computeTradeRecommendation function.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for dark theme, two neon theme variants (dark-neon and cyber-glow), and animated background gradients using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/lib/learningEngine.ts: IndexedDB-based continuous learning engine that stores prediction records, tracks asset-specific accuracy stats, and adapts indicator weights based on prediction outcomes.
frontend/src/lib/orderBookDepth.ts: Utilities for parsing, aggregating, and analyzing order book depth data including bid/ask levels, price buckets, wall detection, and metrics like spread and imbalance.
frontend/src/lib/radarFilters.ts: Manages radar filter persistence in localStorage for anomaly types, minimum scores, and confidence thresholds with load/save/reset functions.
frontend/src/lib/radarSensitivity.ts: Defines three radar sensitivity presets (conservative, balanced, aggressive) with detection thresholds, corroboration rules, and notification policies, persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/resetFromScratch.ts: Orchestrates complete app data reset by clearing IndexedDB, localStorage, CacheStorage, and unregistering service workers, with success flag tracking and reload functionality.
frontend/src/lib/tradeRecommendation.ts: Defines trade recommendation types and computes entry/exit points with stop-loss and take-profit levels based on modality-specific parameters (scalping, swing, breakout, reversal, SMC, FVG) using frontend-fetched Binance market data including technical analysis, support/resistance zones, and institutional orders.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient for data fetching and wraps the App component with InternetIdentityProvider and QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space (including neon colors for trading UI), container settings, border radius variables, and custom box shadows for neon effects.
project_state.json: Project state document tracking version 47-48 deployment issues, architectural notes confirming backend has no Binance API calls, and feature requests for generating clean version 49 deployment while preserving all market analysis, trading modalities, and PWA functionality.
